items.name: animated-counter
items.title: Animated Counter
items.description: A number counter with odometer-style digit rotation animation using GSAP. Perfect for statistics, metrics, and dashboard displays.

items.name: hold-button
items.title: Hold Button
items.description: A confirmation button that fills up while being held, perfect for destructive or irreversible actions.

items.name: theme-toggle
items.title: Theme Toggle
items.description: A theme toggle button with clip-path view transition animation for smooth dark/light mode switching.

items.name: cta-button
items.title: CTA Button
items.description: An animated call-to-action button with a traveling arrow and expanding background effect. Uses mix-blend-mode for automatic light/dark theme support.

items.name: separator
items.title: Separator
items.description: An interactive separator with a wobbling string animation. The line bends toward the mouse cursor and oscillates with a satisfying spring effect when released.

items.name: tabs
items.title: Tabs
items.description: Shadcn-compatible tabs component with smooth animations and context awareness, built on Base UI.

items.name: bloom-color-picker
items.title: Bloom Color Picker
items.description: A beautiful flower-petal color picker with radial hue selection, saturation and brightness arcs.
